title: Recover account
body: So I had another LOL account on NA and pressed a link for free rp. Of course it got hacked. As it seems someone else is playing on the account now. Is there a way I can get it back? Thanks.

replies.body: Oh no!  We don't have free RP like this, these are phishing scams!  We can help, though!  Fill out our [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) so we can assist with recover, and we'll get back to you as soon as we can.  In the mean time, run through our [account protection](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account) to secure your info in and outside of League.
